mapper.insert: REPLACE INTO tmall_order (orderCode, totalAmount, actualAmount, buildTime, payTime, totalCount, closeReason, refundAmount, confirmTime, alreadyPayAmount) VALUES (#{orderCode}, #{totalAmount}, #{actualAmount}, #{buildTime}, #{payTime}, #{totalCount}, #{closeReason}, #{refundAmount}, #{confirmTime}, #{alreadyPayAmount})
mapper.select: SELECT SUM( temp1.`quantity` * temp1.costPrice ) AS totalCost FROM (SELECT temp.*, `product`.`productCode` AS proproductcode, `product`.`costPrice` FROM (SELECT `tmall_order`.`orderCode` AS tmallordercode, `tmall_order`.`buildTime`, `tmall_order`.`payTime`, `order_detail`.`orderCode` AS detailordercode, `order_detail`.`quantity`, `order_detail`.`productCode` AS detailproductcode FROM `tmall_order` LEFT OUTER JOIN `order_detail` ON `tmall_order`.`orderCode` = `order_detail`.`orderCode` UNION SELECT `tmall_order`.`orderCode` AS tmallordercode, `tmall_order`.`buildTime`, `tmall_order`.`payTime`, `order_detail`.`orderCode` AS detailordercode, `order_detail`.`quantity`, `order_detail`.`productCode` AS detailproductcode FROM `tmall_order` RIGHT OUTER JOIN `order_detail` ON `tmall_order`.`orderCode` = `order_detail`.`orderCode`) AS temp LEFT OUTER JOIN `product` ON temp.detailproductcode LIKE CONCAT(`product`.`productCode`,'%') ) AS temp1 WHERE temp1.tmallordercode IS NOT NULL AND buildTime IS NOT NULL AND payTime IS NOT NULL AND detailordercode IS NOT NULL AND quantity IS NOT NULL AND detailproductcode IS NOT NULL AND proproductcode IS NOT NULL AND costprice IS NOT NULL AND payTime LIKE CONCAT(#{chooseMonth},'%');

SELECT * FROM (SELECT temp.*, `product`.`productCode` AS proproductcode, `product`.`costPrice` FROM (SELECT `tmall_order`.`orderCode` AS tmallordercode, `tmall_order`.`buildTime`, `tmall_order`.`payTime`, `order_detail`.`orderCode` AS detailordercode, `order_detail`.`quantity`, `order_detail`.`productCode` AS detailproductcode FROM `tmall_order` LEFT OUTER JOIN `order_detail` ON `tmall_order`.`orderCode` = `order_detail`.`orderCode` UNION SELECT `tmall_order`.`orderCode` AS tmallordercode, `tmall_order`.`buildTime`, `tmall_order`.`payTime`, `order_detail`.`orderCode` AS detailordercode, `order_detail`.`quantity`, `order_detail`.`productCode` AS detailproductcode FROM `tmall_order` RIGHT OUTER JOIN `order_detail` ON `tmall_order`.`orderCode` = `order_detail`.`orderCode`) AS temp LEFT OUTER JOIN `product` ON temp.detailproductcode LIKE CONCAT(`product`.`productCode`,'%') ) AS temp1 WHERE payTime LIKE CONCAT(#{chooseMonth},'%');
